Trade/Device Name(s): Sonoclot Coagulation & Platelet Function Analyzer System with Sonoclot Viewer
Regulation Name(s): Activated Whole Blood Clotting Time Tests
Methodologies: Quantitative measurement (ACT, Clot Rate, Platelet Function)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Sonoclot Coagulation & Platelet Function Analyzer System with Sonoclot Viewer for measuring coagulation and platelet function
Indications for Use Summary: In vitro diagnostic system for measuring coagulation and platelet function, providing information on the hemostasis process including clot formation time, rate of fibrin polymerization, clot retraction, and fibrinolysis, with qualitative and quantitative results to aid in identifying coagulopathies
